Wesbite Creation

How to make this website.

I was able to make this website thanks to the youtube videos of Traversy Media. Not only did it help me make the initial website but it taught me other valuable skills I utilized in order to create the responsive web pages on this website. Below are the 7 tutorial, however, I have made many changes here and there. For instance I do not use tutorial 7 because I have chosen to host this website myself off of a raspberry pie.
